At CupFe Expresso, our mission is to deliver a coffee experience that’s rich, aromatic, and unforgettable. With sustainably sourced beans and a carefully curated menu of handcrafted beverages, we take pride in creating the perfect cup every time. Whether it’s your morning boost or a relaxing afternoon retreat, CupFe Expresso is where coffee meets passion.
You won’t be charged for canceling, but we kindly ask that you notify us at least 24 hours in advance. Please note that any payments made are non-refundable.
All transmission of personally identifiable information is via secure channels. By clicking \"Reserve Now\" you agree to CupFe Expresso Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.

- This bundle cannot be canceled.
- Reservations cannot be changed.
- Arrive on time to avoid issues.
- Contact support for any assistance.
Welcome to CupFe Expresso! By using our app,you agree to the following Terms and Conditions. Please read them carefully!

By using the App, you represent that you are of legal age 
and have the legal capacity to enter into a binding 
agreement. If you are using the App on behalf of an 
organization, you represent that you have the authority
to bind the organization to these Terms.

You are responsible for ensuring the accuracy and completeness of the information provided through the App. You agree to comply with all applicable laws and regulations while using the App and to treat transportation providers with respect and courtesy.

Payment for CupFe Expresso services booked through the App will be processed in accordance with the payment terms specified within the App. You agree to provide accurate and valid payment information and authorize us to charge the applicable fees for the services provided.
If you have any question about these Terms and Conditions, please contact us at @CupFeExpresso.com
In CupFe Expresso, We are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Notice explains how we collect,use, and share information when you use our app for ordering and reservation.
When you use Cupfe application, we may collect personal information such as your name, email, phone number and payment information.
We may share your data with third parties to process payments or store data securely.
You may delete your account at anytime by accessing your account settings in the App.
Please let us know if you are allergic to anything or if we need to avoid anything.
